Series.Actors: |Jack Davenport|Sarah Alexander|Gina Bellman|Kate Isitt|Ben Miles|Richard Coyle|Richard Mylan|
Series.Overview: On average, men and women think about sex every six seconds. Shorten that to every second, and you've got Coupling. This series centers around Susan and Steve (who are a couple), and Sally and Patrick join the gang as friends of Susan (and then Steve), while Steve pulls in his best friend Jeff and his crazy ex Jane.
